func.title: EffectCall

param.name: target
param.desc: Target object of the effect the of which you want to access variables. nil for global effects.

param.name: command
param.desc: Function to be called. The prefix 'Fx' is automatically prepended to the function name. Do not include 'Fx' in the parameter.

func.desc: Makes a function call in the specified effect. The call is made within the context of the effect. The first two parameters are always the target object and the effect. The remaining parameters can be freely chosen.
func.remark: For examples and more information see the effects documentation.
